name: Bouncy Kitty - Bounce and Jump on Trampoline
name_original: Bouncy Kitty - Bounce and Jump on Trampoline
description:
FREE FOR A LIMITED TIME
___________________________________ 
„Lovely cats”
„A very challenging game”
„Watch out: ADDICTIVE!”
___________________________________

Help your cat to go as far as possible through the level by drawing trampolines were you jump on. Along the way you have to collect mouses and items, watch out for some items they bring bad luck! If you see anything flying above you aim for it! When you hit it you will fly with mega speed through the level. So help this cute cat through different levels. You can buy different cats with the coins you earn after each round.

Bouncy Kitty is a very addictive game to play! And its a lot harder then you think! So try it out now and beat all your friends via Game Center!


Download Bouncy Kitty today while its FREE!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Available for iPhone/iPad
Funny and cute cats!
Great graphics
Fun and addictive gameplay
100% FREE by ads
Upgrade to ad-free version
In-app purchases available
Hours of playing fun
Turn on/off the music
